product.name: Special Edition T-Shirt
product.description: Show off your love for Next.js and Vercel with this unique, limited edition t-shirt. This design is part of a limited run, numbered drop at the June 2021 Next.js Conf. It features a unique, handcrafted triangle design. Get it while supplies last – only 200 of these shirts will be made! All proceeds will be donated to charity.
product.care: This is a limited edition production run. Printing starts when the drop ends.
product.details: This is a limited edition production run. Printing starts when the drop ends. Reminder: Bad Boys For Life. Shipping may take 10+ days due to COVID-19.
